item.title: terraform data types
item.description: Brewing Success: Deploying Terraform’s Data Types for the Cloud Café in Azure Link to heading Introduction: Welcome to the grand opening of the Cloud Café, where the aroma of freshly brewed coffee masks the stench of poorly deployed Azure infrastructure. Today, we’re not just serving up skinny, double-vented caramel mocha-lattes; we’re crafting the infrastructure in the Cloud Cafe global datacenter using some of Terraform’s complex data types — lists, sets, and maps.
